titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: PERCENTAGE OF NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE REFERRALS CONCLUDED WITHIN 28 DAYS (STANDARD) - Description

div.p: PERCENTAGE OF NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE REFERRALS CONCLUDED WITHIN 28 DAYS (STANDARD) is the derived percentage of referrals for NHS Continuing Healthcare (Standard) that were concluded within 28 days.

PERCENTAGE OF NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE REFERRALS CONCLUDED WITHIN 28 DAYS (STANDARD) is derived from NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE REFERRALS CONCLUDED (where the NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE TYPE is National Code '
NHS Continuing Healthcare (Standard)
' and NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE REFERRALS CONCLUDED (WITHIN 28 DAYS STANDARD).
